text: The Local Appointments Commissions were created by the Local Authorities (Officers and Employees) Act 1926,http://archive.oireachtas.ie/1984/REPORT_07021984_1.html as enacted by the government of W. T. Cosgrave, to counter allegations of favouritism at local levels in government in Ireland. ==References== Category:Local government in the Republic of Ireland
title: Local Appointments Commission
